description: This file is a shell script that configures firewall rules using iptables and ip6tables to allow specific TCP ports (8088, 8087, 8090) on a specific network interface (erouter0). It continuously monitors and ensures that the rules are present, adding them if missing.

methods.name: add_v4firewall_rule
methods.description: Adds IPv4 firewall rules to accept TCP traffic on specified ports for the erouter0 interface.

methods.name: add_v6firewall_rule
methods.description: Adds IPv6 firewall rules to accept TCP traffic on specified ports for the erouter0 interface.

methods.name: start_firewall_service
methods.description: Main loop that checks if firewall rules are present and adds them if missing, running continuously every 60 seconds.
